document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">fits </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Umber </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Coat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Tailor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Nut? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Combined </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">seam </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Raiment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Dream </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">spun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">Auburn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">Cloth? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Computed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">girth? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Chestnut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">aged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">grows </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">primeval </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Clothes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">wise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Accomplished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Surprise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">Countryman </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">undone! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: How fits his umber coat
